inclusion.criterion: able to play routine activities such as basketball and soccer
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: prefer lying down most of the time
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: shoulder imbalance and shifting head to right
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: candidate for scoliosis surgery according to perioperative MEP monitoring
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: cortisone or anesthetic injections within the last 3 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain, no other medical condition.
